item.title: Increase Your Focus with This Free Ambient Noise Generator
item.description:
Increase Your Focus with This Free Ambient Noise Generator

Build your own immersive, nature-inspired soundscape to eliminate distractions and focus on what matters.

item.title: Get Free, Royalty-Free Music Every Week - Music for Makers
item.description:
Get Free, Royalty-Free Music Every Week - Music for Makers

Wondering what you'll get if you join? The music we send will vary week to week in terms of genre, mood, length, and instruments used. (Because, hey, variety is the spice of life!) But to give you an idea of what to expect, here a few of our most popular songs.
